Player History
Drafted in 14th round, 214th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Wendell Cox (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2015, off Roy Fisk (NY)...
Traded from Kansas City to San Francisco on 7/25/2017 (Going to SF: RF Jeremy McAfee. Going to KC: P Michael Eger)...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/28/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Traded from Houston to Montreal on 3/2/2019 (Going to MON: RF Jeremy McAfee. Going to HOU: P Lee Wyrick, P Thomas Leu)...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 4/14/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
